title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk and mercerized cotton embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross and back stitches on a plain weave foundation; fringe on all four sides secured by whip stitch
description: Bands of religious motifs and alphabets at top introduced by Maltese cross, then a floral band and isolated motifs dominated by a house in a landscape.  Outer border of a Greek key design.  Mercerized cotton and silk used as embroidery threads indicate the piece is not as early as dated.
name: Sampler
